section.32: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It is narrated on the authority of Ibn Abu Aufa that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) cursed the tribes (who had marched upon Medina with a combined force in 5 H) and said:O Allah, Revealer of the Book, swift in (taking) account, put the tribes to rout. O Lord, defeat them and shake them
